RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT EVENT_CODE, EVENT_DESCR, ACCT_ENTRY_DEFN, ADVICES_DEFN FROM OLTBS_EVENT WHERE MODULE = ? ORDER BY EVENT_CODE

SELECT ACCOUNTING_ROLE,ROLE_DESCRIPTION,ROLE_TYPE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT B.ROLE_CODE ACCOUNTING_ROLE, B.ROLE_DESCRIPTION ROLE_DESCRIPTION, B.ROLE_TYPE FROM OLTBS_ACCROLE B WHERE B.MODULE = ?) WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ACCOUNTING_ROLE
SELECT DISTINCT AMOUNT_TAG, DESCRIPTION, AMOUNT_TAG_TYPE FROM OLTBS_AMOUNT_TAG WHERE ACCT_ENTRY_DEFN_ALLOWED = 'Y' AND LANGUAGE_CODE = 'ENG' AND MODULE = ?
SELECT TRN_CODE, TRN_DESC FROM STTMS_CORE_TRN_CODE WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' ORDER BY TRN_CODE
SELECT MIS_HEAD, HEAD_DESC FROM OLTMS_MIS_HEAD WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' ORDER BY MIS_HEAD
SELECT DISTINCT MSG_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, PRIORITY, GENERATE_AT_INPUT FROM OLTMS_MSG_TYPE WHERE (MODULE = ? OR MODULE='OL') AND SHOW_IN_PRODUCT = 'Y'
SELECT MODULE_ID, MODULE_DESC FROM SMTBS_MODULES WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' AND MODULE_ID NOT IN ('II') ORDER BY MODULE_ID
